title: Senior Fullstack Developer - Golang (Remote)
description:
Olá!

A Aggrandize nasceu em 2015 com a missão de engrandecer pessoas e negócios . Guiados por valores como adaptabilidade, colaboração, foco no cliente e visão de dono, oferecemos soluções que transformam desafios em oportunidades.


Somos especialistas em Platform Engineering , Data Analytics , Modern Applications e Cybersecurity , sempre com o compromisso de impulsionar o crescimento e a inovação de nossos parceiros.

Nosso trabalho é mais do que tecnologia; é sobre potencializar resultados. Increase the power of your business .


Agora que você conhece a cultura Aggrandize, saiba mais sobre a oportunidade:


❇️ O que esperamos de você - Hard Skills:

  • Proficiência em linguagem GoLang.
  • Proficiência em Git e seus principais fluxos de trabalho, incluindo branches, pull requests e merges.
  • Experiência com desenvolvimento de API's.
  • Conhecimentos em testes automatizados e CI/CD.
  • Desenvolvimento e consumo de APIs RESTful, além de conhecimento em protocolo HTTP, autenticação e autorização.
  • Compreensão de princípios de design, padrões de projeto, e arquitetura de sistemas distribuídos.


❇️ O que esperamos de você - Soft Skills:

  • Adaptabilidade;
  • Colaboração;
  • Visão de Dono;
  • Foco no Cliente.


✨O que oferecemos (modalidade CLT):

  • VR/VA de R$38/dia (cartão flexível);
  • Auxílio flex de R$210/mês (cartão flexível);
  • TotalPass;
  • Plano de saúde e odontológico;
  • Seguro de vida;
  • PLR;
  • Day off de aniversário;
  • Treinamentos e certificações custeadas pela Aggrandize;
  • Programa de indicação premiada;
  • Trilha de carreira.

title: KYC Specialist（remote）
description:
Responsibilities:


Conduct international verification case reviews, including individual and corporate verifications.

Review and confirm the results of Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and economic sanctions blacklist screenings.

Coordinate with other departments on KYC/CDD-related workflows and process daily applications.

Assist in optimizing the global customer KYC/CDD process.

Analyze KYC vendor review situations and seek better solutions.

Assist in monitoring the daily status of KYC/CDD and check the system's operation.

Conduct research on the KYC/CDD regulatory requirements and documentation for different countries and complete the research report.

Assist in the implementation of AML policies and other policies involving KYC/CDD.

Responsible for dealing with difficult KYC problems related to Portuguese, Spanish if applicable.

Support the Team Leader in completing other related tasks.


Position Requirements:


A bachelor's degree or higher in finance, law, economics, auditing, languages or related fields from a full-time university program (preference for graduates from internationally renowned universities). Proficiency in Mandarin is preferred.

At least two years of experience in KYC/CDD or other compliance-related roles within banks, securities, or other financial institutions is preferred.

Proficiency in English, with the ability to use English as a working language.

Portuguese or Spanish is the native language.

Familiarity with Anti-Money Laundering and international economic sanctions theories; CAMS certification is a plus.

A stable personality with a strong sense of compliance and responsibility, strong learning and stress tolerance abilities, good communication skills, meticulous work, high enthusiasm, and a sense of responsibility.

Basic data analysis skills and proficiency in using office software such as Excel, Word, PPT.

title: Engenheiro Fullstack (com foco em Frontend) - Time Internacional
description:
A Getronics é líder global em soluções de tecnologia, com uma equipe de mais de 4.000 colegas em 17 países, fornecendo serviços abrangentes de ponta a ponta em todo o mundo. Temos o compromisso de oferecer um atendimento excepcional ao cliente, para permitir que eles se concentrem em seus principais pontos fortes, enquanto confiam suas necessidades de TI à Getronics. Temos uma oportunidade incrível para você se juntar à nossa equipe, na seguinte vaga:


Engenheiro Fullstack (com foco em Frontend) - Time Internacional


O que oferecemos a você:

- Assistência médica sem desconto para titulares

- Assistência odontológica sem desconto para titulares

- Cartão flex tanto para alimentação quanto refeição

- Auxílio home office para vaga remota

- Vale transporte para posições presenciais ou híbridas

- Auxílio creche

- Seguro de vida

- Desconto em terapia: plataforma de apoio psicossocial

- Parceria com instituições de ensino

- Parceria com escolas de idiomas

- Programa de subsídio para aulas de inglês

- Programa de indicações: prêmio para indicações bem-sucedidas

- Licença maternidade estendida de 180 dias e a licença paternidade de 20 dias

- Treinamento completo fornecido como parte de um processo de indução robusto, incluindo oportunidades de desenvolvimento contínuo com nossa plataforma de aprendizado online NorthStar, LinkedIn Learning e Udemy, que possui mais de 80.000 cursos disponíveis

- GetVibes - nosso programa de escuta ativa que nos permite conectar e ouvir feedback de todos os colegas, e como empresa, trabalhamos juntos para elaborar planos de ação para melhorar e desenvolver continuamente a Getronics!


O que esperar desta posição:

  • Estamos em busca de um Engenheiro Fullstack com foco em Frontend para atuar no desenvolvimento, manutenção e evolução de aplicações web modernas.
  • O profissional será responsável por construir interfaces eficientes, responsivas e acessíveis, utilizando React, NextJS e TypeScript, além de colaborar no backend com Python em serviços integrados à AWS.
  • Você irá trabalhar em conjunto com equipes multidisciplinares/multiculturais para garantir a entrega de soluções escaláveis, testáveis e alinhadas às necessidades do negócio e dos usuários.
  • Espera-se familiaridade com testes de interface (UI Test), integrações contínuas via GitHub Actions, e boas práticas de desenvolvimento ágil.


O que esperamos de você:

  • Inglês Fluente (verbal e escrita).
  • Frontend: React, NextJS, TypeScript, Redux.
  • Backend: Python.
  • DevOps/Infra: AWS, GitHub Actions.
  • Testes: UI Testes automatizados.
  • Outros: Git, metodologias ágeis.


Diferenciais:

  • Experiência com testes automatizados de ponta a ponta (com Cypress ou similares).


- Horário de Trabalho 09h às 18hs

- Modelo Remoto


O que fazer em seguida:

Caso você seja a pessoa que estamos procurando, aguarde nosso contato para te conhecermos melhor e siga as instruções durante o processo seletivo. Se você gostaria de fazer alguma pergunta sobre nossas vagas, sobre a Getronics como empresa ou qualquer outra coisa, por favor, não hesite em entrar em contato. A equipe de RH estará disponível no e-mail

Se você gostaria de fazer alguma pergunta sobre nossas vagas, sobre a Getronics como empresa ou qualquer outra coisa, por favor, não hesite em entrar em contato. A equipe de RH estará disponível no e-mail

title: Analista de Linux Júnior
description:
Estamos buscando um(a) Analista de Linux Júnior com perfil técnico e para atuar na administração de servidores Linux e apoiar na automação e segurança dos nossos ambientes.


Requisitos Imprescindíveis:

  • Conhecimento Imprescindível Linux – instalação, configuração e manutenção de servidores
  • Experiência prévia com Sistemas Operacionais e Windows
  • Familiaridade Desejável com Ansible
  • Conhecimento básico/intermediário em scripts (Bash, Python, etc.)
  • Inglês Intermediário/ Avançado


Principais Atividades:

  • Instalação, configuração e monitoramento de servidores Linux
  • Gerenciamento de usuários, permissões e grupos
  • Apoio em troubleshooting e análise de desempenho
  • Criação de scripts e automações com Bash, Python e Ansible
  • Aplicação de atualizações de segurança e hardening
  • Documentação técnica dos ambientes


Sobre vagas:

Horário: 00:00 às 08:00

Modalidade: Full Home Office


O que oferecemos:

  • Ambiente colaborativo e multicultural.
  • Oportunidade de desenvolvimento profissional em uma das líderes globais em tecnologia.
  • Pacote de benefícios competitivo.

title: Especialista Product Manager I
description:
Quem é Stone Tech?

A Stone nasceu com o propósito de ser protagonista na transformação da indústria de pagamentos, lutando para oferecer as melhores soluções para quem empreende no Brasil.


Pensando nisso, construímos a Stone Tech! A junção dos times de tecnologia Stone Co. e as empresas financeiras do grupo que reconhecem o potencial empreendedor de cada brasileiro. Por aqui, temos todas as inovações e tecnologias de ponta da Stone, Pagar.me, Ton e Vitta, com uma galera referência no mercado de tecnologia, em um ambiente descontraído, repleto de desafios, oportunidades, flexibilidade, teamplay e desenvolvimento contínuo.


Nossa cultura:

Por aqui, vivemos nossa cultura no dia a dia, guiados por esses 5 pilares:


⚡Own It: Ter espírito de dono te faz conquistar a liberdade. Valorizamos a autonomia e a proatividade, somos responsáveis pelo o que entregamos e queremos sempre evoluir o nosso negócio.


Live the Ride: Faça. Feito é melhor que perfeito. Aprendemos com os erros e encaramos desafios como oportunidades de aprendizado.


No Bullshit: Agir com simplicidade. Somos pessoas práticas, sinceras e gostamos de feedbacks. Sabemos que às vezes vamos errar e contamos com essa transparência para evoluirmos.

title: Senior Java Software Engineer
description:
Location: Remote

Duration: 7+ months

Compensation (average salary in Brazilian currency): R$170–195/hour


About the Role:

Our client is seeking a Senior Java Software Enginee r to join their development team on a contract basis. This role is part of a large-scale code conversion initiative and offers the opportunity to work across the full software development lifecycle. The ideal candidate will bring deep technical knowledge, a strong foundation in backend API development, and an agile mindset.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs using Java and Spring Boot.
  • Develop RESTful services aligned with business needs and best practices.
  • Utilize Spring dependency injection for efficient code structuring.
  • Integrate core Java solutions in scenarios where APIs are not suitable.
  • Work with and adapt existing legacy codebases as part of the transformation process.
  • Write clean, maintainable code with strong attention to performance and reliability.
  • Develop and maintain unit tests using JUnit and participate in code reviews.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including QA and other developers.
  • Participate in agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, reviews, and retrospectives.


Required Skills & Experience:

  • 5+ years of Java development experience with a strong focus on Spring Boot and API creation.
  • Solid knowledge of RESTful API design and microservices architecture.
  • Strong grasp of core Java fundamentals (multithreading, concurrency, memory management).
  • Familiarity with API documentation tools like Swagger/OpenAPI.
  • Experience using Jenkins pipelines and Git version control.


Preferred Qualifications:

  • Exposure to AWS services and cloud-based application development.
  • Familiarity with both SQL and NoSQL database technologies.
  • Experience with older Java versions, particularly Java 8.
  • Basic understanding or experience with generative AI tools and prompt engineering.


Why Apply?

  • Work with a forward-thinking team on a high-impact transformation project.
  • Flexible remote work arrangement.
  • Competitive hourly compensation for an extended contract engagement.


If you're a skilled Java/Spring Boot developer looking for your next exciting contract opportunity, we invite you to apply and be part of this impactful initiative!

title: Graphic Designer
description:
Job Description
About you
You are someone who wants to influence your own development. You’re looking for a company where you have the opportunity to pursue your interests and be able to grow professionally.
You should have extensive experience in designing vehicle wraps and be proficient in Adobe Creative Suite, particularly Adobe Illustrator. This role requires you to have a keen eye for detail, and a strong understanding of industry best practices.
You bring to Applaudo the following competencies:
  • Bachelor’s Degree in Design or similar relevant field.
  • 5+ years of experience in vehicle graphics design.
  • Strong proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, especially Adobe Illustrator.
  • Ability to create and modify dimensionally accurate templates.
  • Understanding of production file preparation and industry best practices.
  • Excellent attention to detail and ability to work within budget constraints.
  • Willingness to learn and use proprietary task management systems.
You will be accountable for the following responsibilities:
  • Create visually appealing and dimensionally accurate vehicle wrap designs.
  • Utilize Adobe Illustrator to produce high-quality designs.
  • Develop and adjust templates for various vehicle types, ensuring accuracy.
  • Prepare production files with proper layering structures, grouping, and clipping masks.
  • Design within specific material and budget constraints, optimizing material usage.
  • Apply best practices such as rounding corners, applying bleeds, and bubble cuts to designs.
  • Ensure all designs meet required specifications and standards to avoid errors.
  • Use the company's proprietary task management system to manage and distribute projects.
Qualifications
Technical Skills:
Adobe Creative Suite, Adobe Illustrator, Vehicle Graphic Design
Additional Information
Here at Applaudo Studios values as trust, communication, respect, excellence and team work are our keys to success. We know we are working with the best and thus treat each other with respect and admiration without asking.
Submit your application today, and don't miss this opportunity to join the Best Digital team in the Region!
We truly appreciate all the hard and outstanding work our team makes every day at Applaudo Studios, and that's why the perks that we offer, are deeply thought and designed as a way to thank them for their commitment and excellence.
Some of our perks and benefits:
  • Work from home
  • Flexible schedule
  • Celebrations
  • Special discounts
  • Entertainment area
  • Flexible work spaces
  • Great work environment
  • Private medical insurance
  • Benefits may vary according to your location and/or availability. Request further information when applying.

title: Desenvolvedor ETL (DataStage)/Python
description:
A Engesoftware está em busca de um Desenvolvedor ETL (DataStage)/Python PL para compor o seu time!

Vaga extensível para Pessoas com Deficiência - PCD


Benefícios:

  • Apoio jurídico, caso precise;
  • Apoio nutricional, para uma alimentação mais saudável;
  • Apoio financeiro, para planejar finanças pessoais ou investimento a longo prazo;

title: Ilustrador de Jogos Sênior
description:
A RapidPlay Games está procurando um Mestre Ilustrador para Jogos de Cassino!


Mergulhe no mundo vibrante dos jogos de cassino com a RapidPlay Games! Estamos à procura de um Ilustrador de Jogos Sênior, uma verdadeira estrela na arte de transformar conceitos em visuais cativantes, para se juntar à nossa tripulação criativa.


Nesta posição você terá um papel central no ciclo de vida de nossos projetos de jogo, desde a centelha inicial da ideia até o brilho do lançamento, assegurando que cada elemento artístico esteja alinhado com a visão estabelecida.


Seu papel incluirá:

  • Criar o Conceito e Concretizar Visões Artísticas: Da primeira rabiscada no papel até a arte final, você será responsável por sugerir e dar vida a personagens envolventes, cenários imersivos e interfaces intuitivas. Sua criatividade será o combustível que impulsiona o visual dos nossos jogos.
  • Colaboração e Comunicação: Você estará no coração da ação, trabalhando lado a lado com Game Designers, Animadores, Programadores e Game Producers, para garantir que todos os aspectos do jogo fluam em harmonia.


O que buscamos em você:

  • Experiência Comprovada: Você deve trazer ao menos 3 anos de experiência em ilustração 2D, com um portfólio que fala por si. Se tiver experiência em 3D, melhor ainda.
  • Maestria Artística: Seu conhecimento em desenho, composição, perspectiva, iluminação, e teoria das cores deve ser excepcional. Você deve ser capaz de pintar digitalmente com a mesma facilidade que respira. A, experiência com Concepts 2D para Animação é um grande extra.
  • Versatilidade e Criatividade: Habilidade para adaptar-se, criar e propor soluções inovadoras, com estilos diferenciados, mantendo o respeito pelos prazos e diretrizes artísticas.
  • Colaboração e Resiliência: Você deve ser capaz de trabalhar de forma independente e em equipe, aceitando feedbacks e críticas de forma construtiva, e estar acostumado(a) a manter arquivos e pastas sempre atualizados e organizados.
  • Conhecimento e interesse em se aprofundar no uso de AI, acelerando partes do processo e trazendo novas ideias a roda de discussão.
  • Busca constante por conhecimento, seja na área de jogos de cassino, seja em novas ferramentas ou técnicas.


Você se destacará se possuir:

  • Experiência em jogos, particularmente em jogos de cassino.
  • Expertise em design gráfico e UI/UX.
  • Proficiência em inglês.


Detalhes da Posição:

  • Modelo PJ
  • 40 horas semanais
  • Full remote


Junte-se a nós na RapidPlay Games e deixe sua marca no mundo dos jogos de cassino, onde sua arte não apenas será vista, mas vivida e jogada por milhares!

title: Data Engineer
description:
JOB DESCRIPTION

A global biopharmaceutical company is seeking strong Power BI Engineers (junior, mid-level, and lead level) to join their team to support a portfolio of ongoing clinical operations projects. These individuals will work on a team of Power BI Engineers of all levels and will partner with technical and functional partners to meet the project needs. The ideal candidates should and in-depth expertise with Power BI (including DAX and Semantic Model Development), strong PySpark & Python coding experience, and experience with Databricks, Fabric, or a similar Spark platform. Additionally, strong communication skills are a must along with the proven ability to work with cross functional teams and stakeholders to drive project work (to be considered for a Lead level role, candidates must also have working experience leading other team members and their work). These are immediate, ongoing needs that will go until the end of 2025 with the possibility of extensions into 2026. These positions are based in LATAM and candidates are able to sit remotely in either Brazil or Chile.

REQUIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE

- 5+ years of experience with Power BI development and engineering (DAX and semantic model development and deployment) - Strong hands on coding ability in PySpark and Python - Professional working experience with Databricks, Fabirc, or similar Spark platforms - Fair knowledge on the use of Azure Dev Ops (ADO) to manage repository and versions - Strong communication skills and experience engaging directly with business stakeholders and technical teams

NICE TO HAVE SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE

- Knowledge of Tabular and ALM tools to work on Semantic Model and automation - Experience working for a global company/ with a global team



Compensation :

$22/hr to $27/hr.

Exact compensation may vary based on several factors, including skills, experience, and education.

Benefit packages for this role will start on the 31st day of employment and include medical, dental, and vision insurance, as well as HSA, FSA, and DCFSA account options, and 401k retirement account access with employer matching. Employees in this role are also entitled to paid sick leave and/or other paid time off as provided by applicable law.

title: Platform Engineer
description:
About Us

Smarter Contact is a fast-growing SaaS company with a text and voice messaging communications platform enhanced by AI technologies. We serve real estate professionals across the US and are proud to be the market leader in this space. We're always looking for performance-driven team members to join our growing team.


The Role

We’re seeking a skilled Platform Engineer to join our engineering team and help build robust internal tools and systems that enhance development and operational capabilities. This role is crucial to developing and maintaining the infrastructure that powers our engineering efficiency.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement internal DevOps tools and automation systems
  • Develop and maintain configuration management systems across multiple environments
  • Create and maintain simulation environments for third-party integrations
  • Build and improve developer productivity tools and internal extensions
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand and address platform needs
  • Contribute to the architecture and design of internal tools and systems
  • Implement monitoring, logging, and observability solutions
  • Create a layered permissions admin panel to automate common support requests
  • Build reporting frameworks to query system data for financial and operational insights


Technical Requirements:

  • Strong experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services and best practices
  • Proficient in TypeScript and modern JavaScript development
  • Experience building and maintaining Chrome extensions
  • Strong SQL knowledge and experience with database optimization
  • Experience with GraphQL API development and integration
  • Expertise in developing simulation/mock environments for third-party APIs
  • Familiarity with API integration patterns (REST, GraphQL, WebHooks)
  • Knowledge of DevOps practices and tools
  • Experience with configuration management and environment variable handling


Qualifications:

  • 7+ years of software engineering experience, with at least 2 years in platform or tooling engineering
  • Proven track record of building internal developer tools and automation systems
  • Strong understanding of software development lifecycle and CI/CD practices
  • Experience with communication APIs (e.g., Twilio)
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
  • Strong communication skills and ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams


Nice to Have:

  • Experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
  • Familiarity with containerization and orchestration tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)
  • Background in SaaS or cloud-native applications
  • Experience with monitoring and observability tools
  • Experience with CRM platform integrations, ideally HubSpot


We’re looking for someone who’s passionate about building tools that empower developers and improve engineering efficiency. If you enjoy creating solutions that make development workflows smoother and more reliable, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Platform Engineer
description:
About Us

Smarter Contact is a fast-growing SaaS company with a text and voice messaging communications platform enhanced by AI technologies. We serve real estate professionals across the US and are proud to be the market leader in this space. We're always looking for performance-driven team members to join our growing team.


The Role

We’re seeking a skilled Platform Engineer to join our engineering team and help build robust internal tools and systems that enhance development and operational capabilities. This role is crucial to developing and maintaining the infrastructure that powers our engineering efficiency.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement internal DevOps tools and automation systems
  • Develop and maintain configuration management systems across multiple environments
  • Create and maintain simulation environments for third-party integrations
  • Build and improve developer productivity tools and internal extensions
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand and address platform needs
  • Contribute to the architecture and design of internal tools and systems
  • Implement monitoring, logging, and observability solutions
  • Create a layered permissions admin panel to automate common support requests
  • Build reporting frameworks to query system data for financial and operational insights


Technical Requirements:

  • Strong experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services and best practices
  • Proficient in TypeScript and modern JavaScript development
  • Experience building and maintaining Chrome extensions
  • Strong SQL knowledge and experience with database optimization
  • Experience with GraphQL API development and integration
  • Expertise in developing simulation/mock environments for third-party APIs
  • Familiarity with API integration patterns (REST, GraphQL, WebHooks)
  • Knowledge of DevOps practices and tools
  • Experience with configuration management and environment variable handling


Qualifications:

  • 7+ years of software engineering experience, with at least 2 years in platform or tooling engineering
  • Proven track record of building internal developer tools and automation systems
  • Strong understanding of software development lifecycle and CI/CD practices
  • Experience with communication APIs (e.g., Twilio)
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
  • Strong communication skills and ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams


Nice to Have:

  • Experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
  • Familiarity with containerization and orchestration tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)
  • Background in SaaS or cloud-native applications
  • Experience with monitoring and observability tools
  • Experience with CRM platform integrations, ideally HubSpot


We’re looking for someone who’s passionate about building tools that empower developers and improve engineering efficiency. If you enjoy creating solutions that make development workflows smoother and more reliable, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Senior Database Administrator (DBA)
description:
Job Title: Senior Database Administrator (DBA)

Location: Remote

Language Skills: Fluent in English, both written and spoken.

Overview:

We are seeking a highly experienced Senior Database Administrator (DBA) with a strong background in Oracle, MySQL, and SQL Server databases, as well as expertise in automation and scripting.

Responsibilities:

  • Database Management: Install, configure, and maintain Oracle, MySQL, and SQL Server databases in production, test, and development environments.
  • Performance Optimization: Monitor and optimize database performance to ensure high availability and reliability.
  • Backup and Recovery: Design and implement backup and recovery strategies to safeguard data integrity.
  • Automation: Develop and maintain scripts for database automation tasks, including backups, monitoring, and performance tuning.
  • Security: Implement and manage database security policies to protect sensitive data.
  • Issue Resolution: Diagnose and resolve database-related issues, providing support to application developers and other stakeholders.
  • Capacity Planning: Plan and manage database capacity to ensure scalability and performance.
  • Documentation: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for database configurations, processes, and procedures.
  • Mentorship: Provide guidance and mentorship to junior DBAs and other team members.

Qualifications:

  • Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • Experience: Minimum of 10 years of experience as a DBA in a mission-critical production environment.
  • Technical Skills:
  • Proficiency in Oracle (versions 10g to 21c), MySQL, and SQL Server (versions 2000 to 2022).
  • Strong scripting skills in SQL/T-SQL, PL/SQL, PowerShell, and Linux/Unix shell scripting.
  • Experience with database management and monitoring tools such as Oracle Enterprise Manager and SQL Server Management Studio.
  • Knowledge of cloud services like AWS, Azure, and Oracle Cloud.
  • Familiarity with High Availability (HA) and Disaster Recovery (DR) solutions.
  • Certifications: Preferred certifications include Oracle Certified Professional (OCP), Microsoft Certified Database Administrator (MCDBA), and AWS Certified Database.
  • Soft Skills: Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Language Skills: Fluent in English, both written and spoken.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with automation tools and frameworks.
  • Knowledge of database replication, clustering, and virtualization technologies.

description:
Our digital agency is looking to hire 3-5 Ruby on Rails developers to add to our team. Must be senior-level and have expert Ruby on Rails full-stack development experience.

  • Must have 5+ years of experience with PostgreSQL / MySQL databases

title: HubSpot Project Manager
description:
About the Role


As a Project Manager at InboundAV, you’ll take the lead on client projects and internal initiatives—guiding them from conception to successful delivery. You’ll manage timelines, resources, and communications while offering strategic insight to improve workflows and outcomes. If you’re an organized, proactive, and people-savvy project leader with a passion for digital marketing and process optimization, we’d love to hear from you.


Key Responsibilities ✅


  • Lead Project Execution: Turn signed proposals and quotes into structured tasks and milestones within our project management tools.
  • Drive Project Success: Manage timelines, scope, budgets, and deliverables across multiple simultaneous projects.
  • Collaborate Cross-Functionally: Coordinate with internal teams (development, design, content, CRM) to ensure smooth execution.
  • Communicate Clearly: Maintain strong communication with Account Managers and clients, ensuring expectations are met or exceeded.
  • Run Effective Meetings: Conduct project status meetings and document progress, risks, and next steps.
  • Own the Tools: Ensure correct and consistent usage of project management systems and processes.
  • Share Knowledge: Lead cross-training sessions and help elevate the team’s overall project management capabilities.
  • Improve Internal Processes: Contribute to operational improvement initiatives, including the integration of emerging technologies like AI.
  • Lead by Example: Set the tone for excellence in project documentation, communications, and collaboration.


What We’re Looking For


﻿Technical Skills & Experience

  • Proven experience working on onboarding projects or implementation projects with HubSpot, as well as experience using different hubs, is required.
  • Proven experience managing digital marketing and/or web/software development projects.
  • Familiarity with Agile, Scrum, or Waterfall methodologies.
  • Proficient in project management tools (e.g., Asana, Trello, ClickUp, Monday.com).
  • Solid understanding of digital marketing practices (Inbound Marketing, CRM, marketing automation).
  • Ability to juggle multiple projects, prioritize tasks, and stay organized under pressure.


Soft Skills

title: Salesforce Core Developer
description:
We are seeking a skilled Salesforce Developer to join our innovative team. The ideal candidate will have a robust understanding of both front-end and back-end development within the Salesforce platform. You will be responsible for designing and implementing user interfaces, developing scalable back-end solutions, and integrating Salesforce with other systems. Your role will be crucial in translating business requirements into technical solutions that enhance user experience and drive efficiency.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement user interfaces using Visualforce, LWC, and Aura Components.
  • Ensure responsive and user-friendly Salesforce applications across various devices.
  • Collaborate with UX/UI designers to convert visual designs into functional experiences.
  • Optimize front-end code for performance and scalability.
  • Implement and maintain CSS frameworks like SLDS for consistent styling.
  • Develop and maintain Apex classes and triggers.
  • Design complex Salesforce database structures with SOQL and SOSL.
  • Integrate Salesforce with external systems using REST/SOAP APIs and middleware.
  • Manage Salesforce data using Data Loader and other ETL tools.
  • Maintain test classes for code coverage and quality.
  • Translate business requirements into technical solutions on the Salesforce platform.
  • Participate in code reviews to uphold high-quality standards.
  • Collaborate with Salesforce administrators and developers for custom solutions.
  • Stay current with Salesforce updates and ensure forward compatibility.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve bugs in Salesforce applications.
  • Document technical processes and provide end-user support and training.


Requirements:

  • In-depth knowledge of Salesforce platform, features, limitations, and best practices.
  • Proficiency in Apex and JavaScript, with a good understanding of HTML, CSS, and web development languages.
  • Experience with Salesforce Lightning (Aura and LWC), Visualforce, and SLDS.
  • Strong grasp of server-side logic, database management, SOQL, SOSL, and web service APIs.
  • Familiarity with Salesforce DX, version control systems, and IDEs like Visual Studio Code.
  • Ability to write comprehensive unit tests and understand mocking frameworks.
  • Skills in data migration and manipulation using Salesforce Data Loader and ETL tools.
  • Experience in Salesforce integrations with external systems.
  • Knowledge of Salesforce security model and best practices.
  • Salesforce Platform Developer I certification is required. Salesforce Administrator or App Builder certification is a plus.
  • Salesforce Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Experience Cloud Consultant Certifications are a plus.


Skill Set:

  • Excellent problem-solving skills with the ability to develop timely solutions.
  • Strong communication skills for effective team and client interactions.
  • Analytical thinking to understand complex requirements and create technical specs.
  • Teamwork and collaboration within cross-functional teams.
  • Efficient time management to meet project deadlines.
  • Adaptability to new technologies and changes within the Salesforce ecosystem.
  • Attention to detail in coding and documentation for accuracy and maintainability.


Languages:

  • English
  • Portuguese


OSF Digital is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, where you can bring your whole self to work. Join an inclusive and passionate community of professionals who help bring about digital transformation for businesses around the world. At OSF Digital, we welcome all individuals and do not discriminate on the basis of gender identity and expression, race, ethnicity, disability, sexual orientation, color, religion, national origin, age, marital status, or any other protected category in any of the jurisdictions in which we conduct business.

  • Translate business requirements into technical solutions on the Salesforce platform.
  • Participate in code reviews to uphold high-quality standards.
  • Collaborate with Salesforce administrators and developers for custom solutions.
  • Stay current with Salesforce updates and ensure forward compatibility.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve bugs in Salesforce applications.
  • Document technical processes and provide end-user support and training.


Requirements:

  • In-depth knowledge of Salesforce platform, features, limitations, and best practices.
  • Proficiency in Apex and JavaScript, with a good understanding of HTML, CSS, and web development languages.
  • Experience with Salesforce Lightning (Aura and LWC), Visualforce, and SLDS.
  • Strong grasp of server-side logic, database management, SOQL, SOSL, and web service APIs.
  • Familiarity with Salesforce DX, version control systems, and IDEs like Visual Studio Code.
  • Ability to write comprehensive unit tests and understand mocking frameworks.
  • Skills in data migration and manipulation using Salesforce Data Loader and ETL tools.
  • Experience in Salesforce integrations with external systems.
  • Knowledge of Salesforce security model and best practices.
  • Salesforce Platform Developer I certification is required. Salesforce Administrator or App Builder certification is a plus.
  • Salesforce Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Experience Cloud Consultant Certifications are a plus.


Skill Set:

  • Excellent problem-solving skills with the ability to develop timely solutions.
  • Strong communication skills for effective team and client interactions.
  • Analytical thinking to understand complex requirements and create technical specs.
  • Teamwork and collaboration within cross-functional teams.
  • Efficient time management to meet project deadlines.
  • Adaptability to new technologies and changes within the Salesforce ecosystem.
  • Attention to detail in coding and documentation for accuracy and maintainability.


Languages:

  • English
  • Portuguese

description:

The ideal candidate will have a robust understanding of both front-end and back-end development within the Salesforce platform. You will be responsible for designing and implementing user interfaces, developing scalable back-end solutions, and integrating Salesforce with other systems. Your role will be crucial in translating business requirements into technical solutions that enhance user experience and drive efficiency.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement user interfaces using Visualforce, LWC, and Aura Components.
  • Ensure responsive and user-friendly Salesforce applications across various devices.
  • Collaborate with UX/UI designers to convert visual designs into functional experiences.
  • Optimize front-end code for performance and scalability.

title: Accounting Client Support Specialist
description:
Job Title: Accounting Client Support Specialist

Location: Remote (UTC+2 Eastern Europe & South Africa business hours)

Salary Range: up to 2500 USD


Work Schedule: Monday - Friday, Must be available to work 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM (UTC+2) or 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM EST


NOTE: INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR POSITION


Company Overview:


Sagan is an exclusive membership community for top executives, founders, and CEOs seeking to hire and maximize the impact of international talent. We bridge the gap between global talent and US-based businesses, connecting candidates from vibrant regions like Latin America, the Philippines, India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, and Africa with leading American companies. Discover a world of career possibilities with Sagan.


About the Company:


Sagan represents a fast-growing US-based tax and bookkeeping services provider supporting small businesses and startup founders - especially those with international roots. The team is lean, hands-on, and passionate about simplifying complex financial topics for entrepreneurs.


Position Overview:


We're looking for an Accounting Client Support Specialist who thrives on solving client problems, translating financial jargon into human language, and delivering top-tier service with speed and precision. You'll be a trusted point of contact, navigating everything from basic queries to complex account reviews. If you love digging into the details and creating clarity for others, this role is for you.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Own the inbox: Manage Zendesk tickets from first touch to full resolution with speed and accuracy
  • Communicate clearly and empathetically: Translate tax and bookkeeping details into plain English
  • Troubleshoot independently : Use tools like QuickBooks, Xero, Salesforce, and internal systems to diagnose and resolve issues
  • Keep internal knowledge sharp: Update macros, templates, and documents for future use
  • Spot trends: Identify and propose fixes to recurring problems
  • Maintain data integrity: Double-check all figures, forms, and files
  • Track what matters: Prioritize client satisfaction, resolution speed, and zero-error delivery


Qualifications:

  • 2+ years in a fast-paced client support or success role (accounting experience is a plus)
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Exceptional attention to detail
  • Proficiency in modern business tools and platforms
  • Self-starter with a proactive, problem-solving mindset
  • Stable internet connection and reliable work environment
  • Availability to work Monday to Friday during either of the approved time zones


Nice-to-Haves:

  • Experience supporting tax or financial software clients
  • Familiarity with small business or startup operations
  • Prior remote work experience

title: Desenvolvedor(a) Backend JAVA/NODE Pleno - Agencias Magalu
description:
Buscamos Desenvolvedores (a) backend Java/Node de nível Pleno que queiram fazer parte do nosso time de Agencias Magalu.


Estamos buscando alguém que saiba lidar com desafios diariamente e que consiga trabalhar em equipe, respeitando as diferenças e opiniões de cada um.

Entender mudanças e aprender com elas também é essencial para o dia a dia no Labs.

Gostamos de pessoas e nos ajudamos mutuamente!


Se você é apaixonado(a) pelo o que faz, estuda sempre, e trabalha em equipe essa vaga é para você!


Para ter sucesso nesta posição, você precisará de:


- Experiência em Java ou Node

- Desenvolvimento Orientado a objetos; - Desenvolvimento de testes unitários;

- Programação na linguagem Java, preferencialmente a partir da versão 8;

- Conhecimento em Spring Framework, trabalhamos bastante com Spring-Boot;

- Criação de APIs HTTP seguindo o padrão REST;

- Versionamento usando Git;

- Arquiteturas baseadas em micro serviços;

- Modelagem e uso de Banco de Dados NoSQL, como MongoDB;

- Uso de cache, com Redis por exemplo;

- Mensagerias (Kafka, RabbitMQ);

- Desenvolvimento baseado em TDD, BDD.


Diferenciais:


Tunning de aplicações;

Docker, containers, kubernetes;

DynamoDB, Elastic, Redis, Kafka.

Grpc;


Como é o ambiente de trabalho?

No Luizalabs, temos grande autonomia e responsabilidade, somos multidisciplinares, auto gerenciáveis e com pouca burocracia no nosso cotidiano. Buscamos romper as barreiras que diminuem nossa capacidade de agregar valor ao negócio. Fazemos entregas frequentes e agimos rapidamente ao encontrar problemas; nosso ritmo é acelerado, mas temos tranquilidade e equilíbrio para planejar e executar nossas tarefas com qualidade.

title: Google Ad Specialist
description:
Hey, Dingus!


Yeah, you heard that right. Dingus & Zazzy is looking for a Google Ad Specialist to join our growing team!


About Us

Dingus & Zazzy is a comprehensive digital marketing agency offering services for brands looking to expand their presence across a variety of digital platforms. Our business is expanding globally, and we need talented folks on our team to continue offering stellar service to our clients.

Running a company is a little like building a plane while flying it. There’s always too much to do; doing one thing means neglecting something else. You have to blog, but also be active on social media. You have to build websites and then optimize them for mobile. Email lists. Emails. Keywords. SEM. SEO. UX. UI. FML. OMG. That’s where we come in. We provide an unlimited get-shit-done subscription for our clients. And we need your help!


About the Role

Passionate about making Google Ads work its magic? We’re looking for a motivated individual to jump into the world of paid advertising. You’ll be key in creating and optimizing campaigns that help our clients connect with their audiences and achieve real results. If you’re curious about this position and you’re eager to learn and grow in a supportive environment, we’d love to hear from you.


Responsibilities

  • Understand or research different industries and strategize based on the different needs of clients
  • Audit past campaigns and draw conclusions based on them
  • Audit competitors’ ads and draw conclusions based on them
  • To be able to set up any type of campaign on Google Ads and keep up with the updates that Google makes to different campaigns.
  • To be able to perform relevant keyword research based on the client’s needs and strategy
  • Split the budget based on goals and campaign requirements
  • Understand the different types of audiences that Google supports and how to set them up
  • To be able to read metrics and provide optimization recommendations
  • To be able to use Google Tag Manager and set up proper tracking for each campaign
  • Test different ads, landing pages, and bidding options
  • Keep up with changes and new features in Google Ads


What You’ll Need

  • Real experience running and improving Google Ads campaigns
  • Solid understanding of Google Ads and campaign types (Search, Display, etc.)
  • Comfortable using Google Analytics and similar tools
  • Experience tracking conversions, measuring results, and analyzing data
  • Good organization and time management (good at managing your own time)
  • Solid communication
  • Google Ads certifications are a plus
  • Solid English skills, written and spoken
  • A degree in marketing or business is helpful, but not required, if you have the experience


Extra Points if You

  • Know how to use automation or bidding tools
  • Have used other ad platforms like Facebook or LinkedIn
  • Have worked at an agency before


Our operating hours are from 9 am to 5 pm MST, Monday to Friday.

Ready for the ride of your life? If you think you’re the perfect fit for the role, apply today!

You have to blog, but also be active on social media. You have to build websites and then optimize them for mobile. Email lists. Emails. Keywords. SEM. SEO. UX. UI. FML. OMG. That’s where we come in. We provide an unlimited get-shit-done subscription for our clients. And we need your help!


About the Role

Passionate about making Google Ads work its magic? We’re looking for a motivated individual to jump into the world of paid advertising. You’ll be key in creating and optimizing campaigns that help our clients connect with their audiences and achieve real results. If you’re curious about this position and you’re eager to learn and grow in a supportive environment, we’d love to hear from you.


Responsibilities

  • Understand or research different industries and strategize based on the different needs of clients
  • Audit past campaigns and draw conclusions based on them
  • Audit competitors’ ads and draw conclusions based on them
  • To be able to set up any type of campaign on Google Ads and keep up with the updates that Google makes to different campaigns.
  • To be able to perform relevant keyword research based on the client’s needs and strategy
  • Split the budget based on goals and campaign requirements
  • Understand the different types of audiences that Google supports and how to set them up
  • To be able to read metrics and provide optimization recommendations
  • To be able to use Google Tag Manager and set up proper tracking for each campaign
  • Test different ads, landing pages, and bidding options
  • Keep up with changes and new features in Google Ads


What You’ll Need

  • Real experience running and improving Google Ads campaigns
  • Solid understanding of Google Ads and campaign types (Search, Display, etc.)
  • Comfortable using Google Analytics and similar tools
  • Experience tracking conversions, measuring results, and analyzing data
  • Good organization and time management (good at managing your own time)
  • Solid communication
  • Google Ads certifications are a plus
  • Solid English skills, written and spoken
  • A degree in marketing or business is helpful, but not required, if you have the experience


Extra Points if You

  • Know how to use automation or bidding tools
  • Have used other ad platforms like Facebook or LinkedIn
  • Have worked at an agency before


Our operating hours are from 9 am to 5 pm MST, Monday to Friday.

Ready for the ride of your life? If you think you’re the perfect fit for the role, apply today!

title: Desenvolvedor de back end Sênior
description:
Título da Vaga: Desenvolvedor Back-end Sênior

Sede da empresa: Belo Horizonte, MG

CONSTRUA SEU FUTURO COM A FAST! ⚡

Na Fast Solutions , somos movidos pela inovação e pela capacidade de entregar soluções tecnológicas sob medida para diferentes mercados globais. Somos uma holding com um portfólio diversificado, incluindo desde o desenvolvimento de softwares sob medida até white labels de processadoras de pagamento e soluções para o mercado de processamento global e iGaming. Cada um dos nossos projetos é moldado para potencializar resultados, com um foco incansável na excelência e satisfação de nossos clientes.

Estamos em busca de um Desenvolvedor Back-end Sênior altamente qualificado para integrar nosso time! Se você é apaixonado por tecnologia e tem experiência sólida em desenvolvimento back-end, queremos você no nosso time!

Entre suas responsabilidades estão:

  • Desenvolvimento e manutenção de APIs utilizando NestJS .
  • Gerenciamento e manipulação de banco de dados com PostgreSQL .
  • Implementação de filas e processamento assíncrono com BullMQ .
  • Integração e manutenção de ORM utilizando Prisma .
  • Colaboração com equipes de front-end para garantir a integração eficiente dos serviços.
  • Otimização de desempenho e segurança de sistemas back-end.

Buscamos um profissional com:

  • Sólida experiência com NestJS .
  • Conhecimento avançado em Prisma .
  • Experiência com BullMQ  para gerenciamento de filas.
  • Domínio de PostgreSQL .
  • Familiaridade com metodologias ágeis.
  • Habilidade para trabalhar em equipe e boa comunicação.


Você se destacará se tiver:

  • Experiência em meios de pagamento  e integrações com gateways de pagamento.
  • Conhecimento em microserviços e arquitetura orientada a eventos.


Aqui na Fast, você terá:

Salário competitivo.

title: Program Manager - Customer Service
description:
We’re Hiring: Program Manager - Customer Service

Keeta is an independent brand of Meituan, the world's largest tech-driven retail company. Keeta is revolutionizing the food delivery space. As a dynamic and innovative global platform, Keeta leverages cutting-edge technology to provide fast, reliable, and seamless food delivery experiences. With the mission "We help people eat better, live better", Keeta launched in 2023 and has rapidly expanded across key regions, including Hong Kong, Saudi Arabia and now Brazil.


Are you a strategic thinker and a collaborative leader who thrives on driving seamless coordination and operational excellence? We are looking for a Program Manager to bridge the gap between our business teams and service functions, ensuring the successful execution of key initiatives.


What You’ll Do

  • Be the Key Liaison – Act as the primary connection between business teams and service teams, ensuring smooth communication and goal alignment.
  • Drive Resource Efficiency – Coordinate cross-functional teams, optimize processes, and allocate resources across quality assurance, training, delivery, and process management to maximize efficiency.
  • Lead Program Execution – Develop and manage program plans, budgets, and priorities while identifying risks and implementing proactive solutions.


Why Keeta?

  • Innovation-Driven: Keeta uses the advanced technology solutions to disrupt the traditional food delivery landscape, making every order smarter and faster.
  • Fast-Growing & Dynamic: Keeta is expanding quickly, offering endless opportunities for personal and professional growth.
  • Global Impact: Join a company that’s transforming the way people enjoy food, impacting communities around the world.


What We’re Looking For

  • Bachelor’s degree or higher in Project Management, Business Administration, or a related field.
  • 3+ years of experience in project or program management, preferably with a strong understanding of service operations.
  • Exceptional leadership & collaboration skills – Ability to work across teams and drive initiatives forward.
  • Proficiency in project management tools and strong analytical thinking.
  • Fluency in English & Portuguese – Excellent communication skills in speaking, listening, reading, and writing.


Bonus Points If You Have

PMP, PgMP, or similar certifications.

Experience in process optimization and standardization within service functions.



Location: São Paulo, Brazil

Apply now and be part of a team where learning never stops!

title: Senior IOS Developer
description:
Required Skills & Experience


  • 5 years with Swift iOS development
  • Strong understanding of all aspects of the iOS Provisioning workflow
  • experience with architecture languages (MVVM, MVC, Viper - at least one of them).
  • Strong understanding of all aspects of the iOS Provisioning workflow
  • Familiarity with RESTful and/or GraphQL APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
  • Strong knowledge of iOS UI design principles, patterns, and best practices
  • Experience with unit testing and test automation frameworks (e.g. XCTest and XCUITest etc)
  • Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
  • Experience building with accessibility standards in mind ideally WCAG 2.2
  • Knowledge of the open-source iOS projects and the libraries available for common tasks
  • Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
  • Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
  • Understanding of iOS HIG design principles and interface guidelines


Job Description


Insight Global is seeking a senior iOS developer to join a Toronto-based tech agency. You use modern tools and frameworks but can code up a web app from scratch using only HTML5, CSS3 and vanilla JS (you probably won’t have to but you could do it to prove the point). You are a team player who can fly solo when needed. Although you have the full support of your team mates, you are able to lead the research and solution of complex problems. At the same time, you know when to ask for help and don’t let pride or ego get in the way, because after all, you are part of a team. This role will directly support our client Audi North America and have the opportunity to shape the development of their digital platform.

“Initiative” is your middle name and you don’t give us a chance to chase you. We are on the hunt for people who have an innovative mindset (you still dream of that moonshot project, but are currently working on your side-gig)! Is this you?

You will be spearheading building modern, responsive solutions for a premium brand that values user experience as a priority. You will accomplish this by:


Responsibilities

  • Designing and Building Apps: This involves translating design ideas and user needs into fully functional iOS applications.
  • Writing Code: Using programming languages like Swift or Objective-C to create the app's logic, features, and user interface.
  • Working with iOS Frameworks and APIs: Utilizing Apple's frameworks and APIs (like UIKit, Core Data, and Core Animation) to access device features and build rich functionalities.
  • Creating Intuitive and Engaging Interfaces: Designing user interfaces that are both visually appealing and easy to navigate, adhering to Apple's Human Interface Guidelines.
  • Implementing App Navigation: Developing clear and seamless navigation flows within the app.
  • Optimizing for Different Screen Sizes: Ensuring the app looks and functions correctly on various iOS devices, including iPhones, iPads, and even Apple Watch.
  • Testing App Functionality: Conducting rigorous testing to identify and fix bugs, errors, and performance bottlenecks.
  • Debugging Code: Using debugging tools (like Xcode) to identify and resolve issues in the app's code.

  • Designing and Building Apps: This involves translating design ideas and user needs into fully functional iOS applications.
  • Writing Code: Using programming languages like Swift or Objective-C to create the app's logic, features, and user interface.
  • Working with iOS Frameworks and APIs: Utilizing Apple's frameworks and APIs (like UIKit, Core Data, and Core Animation) to access device features and build rich functionalities.
  • Creating Intuitive and Engaging Interfaces: Designing user interfaces that are both visually appealing and easy to navigate, adhering to Apple's Human Interface Guidelines.
  • Implementing App Navigation: Developing clear and seamless navigation flows within the app.
  • Optimizing for Different Screen Sizes: Ensuring the app looks and functions correctly on various iOS devices, including iPhones, iPads, and even Apple Watch.
  • Testing App Functionality: Conducting rigorous testing to identify and fix bugs, errors, and performance bottlenecks.
  • Debugging Code: Using debugging tools (like Xcode) to identify and resolve issues in the app's code.

title: Senior IOS Developer
description:
Required Skills & Experience


  • 5 years with Swift iOS development
  • Strong understanding of all aspects of the iOS Provisioning workflow
  • experience with architecture languages (MVVM, MVC, Viper - at least one of them).
  • Strong understanding of all aspects of the iOS Provisioning workflow
  • Familiarity with RESTful and/or GraphQL APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
  • Strong knowledge of iOS UI design principles, patterns, and best practices
  • Experience with unit testing and test automation frameworks (e.g. XCTest and XCUITest etc)
  • Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
  • Experience building with accessibility standards in mind ideally WCAG 2.2
  • Knowledge of the open-source iOS projects and the libraries available for common tasks
  • Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
  • Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
  • Understanding of iOS HIG design principles and interface guidelines


Job Description


Insight Global is seeking a senior iOS developer to join a Toronto-based tech agency. You use modern tools and frameworks but can code up a web app from scratch using only HTML5, CSS3 and vanilla JS (you probably won’t have to but you could do it to prove the point). You are a team player who can fly solo when needed. Although you have the full support of your team mates, you are able to lead the research and solution of complex problems. At the same time, you know when to ask for help and don’t let pride or ego get in the way, because after all, you are part of a team. This role will directly support our client Audi North America and have the opportunity to shape the development of their digital platform.

“Initiative” is your middle name and you don’t give us a chance to chase you. We are on the hunt for people who have an innovative mindset (you still dream of that moonshot project, but are currently working on your side-gig)! Is this you?

You will be spearheading building modern, responsive solutions for a premium brand that values user experience as a priority. You will accomplish this by:


Responsibilities

  • Designing and Building Apps: This involves translating design ideas and user needs into fully functional iOS applications.
  • Writing Code: Using programming languages like Swift or Objective-C to create the app's logic, features, and user interface.
  • Working with iOS Frameworks and APIs: Utilizing Apple's frameworks and APIs (like UIKit, Core Data, and Core Animation) to access device features and build rich functionalities.
  • Creating Intuitive and Engaging Interfaces: Designing user interfaces that are both visually appealing and easy to navigate, adhering to Apple's Human Interface Guidelines.
  • Implementing App Navigation: Developing clear and seamless navigation flows within the app.
  • Optimizing for Different Screen Sizes: Ensuring the app looks and functions correctly on various iOS devices, including iPhones, iPads, and even Apple Watch.
  • Testing App Functionality: Conducting rigorous testing to identify and fix bugs, errors, and performance bottlenecks.
  • Debugging Code: Using debugging tools (like Xcode) to identify and resolve issues in the app's code.

title: 126016-中/高级区域销售岗（农机-巴西）
description:
工作职责：

1. 对巴西农机行业运作模式进行分析规划，输出市场分析报告，识别市场机会点；

2. 负责代理商管理，对内对外协调相关资源，传递和执行公司管理要求；

3. 执行所辖区域渠道管理策略，构建完善渠道沙盘，促进销售目标达成，并保障所负责区域的市场健康发展；

4. 落地产品/方案销售在本区域的销售策略，提升公司产品市场占有率及竞争力。


任职要求：

1. 本科及以上学历，葡语及中文可作为工作语言，接受长期在巴西工作；

2. 具备销售、渠道管理等相关经验，熟悉平台商运作模式，有巴西本地工作经验、无人机相关工作经验优先；

3. 具备较强的市场分析和拓展能力、渠道管理能力、执行力、沟通协调能力，心态开放；

4. 工作认真负责、善沟通协调，具备良好的应变能力和承压能力。

title: Java Developer - BRAZIL
description:
This is a fully remote position out of Brazil. This is a CLT opportunity.


Must Haves

  • 3+ years of experience in Java/Springboot (Java8+)
  • Any search experience (elastic, open, apache solr)
  • Experience supporting a large legacy system


Plus

  • AWS
  • Kubernetes


Day to Day

  • Mostly maintenance of client search platforms
  • legacy system focus
  • Fixing bugs



**

Exact compensation may vary based on several factors, including skills, experience, and education.

Benefit packages for this role may include healthcare insurance offerings and paid leave as provided by applicable law.

title: JR Generative AI Engineer
description:
Junior Generative AI Engineer

DRAIVER is an industry disruptor by pioneering the best-in-class AI logistics platform that enables vehicle movement planning, coordination, and execution. We streamline management by connecting businesses to transport services and independent contract drivers, simplifying employment with quick and direct access to jobs and drivers. Our contract driver network is made up of 1000s of associates, servicing clients that range from large Multi-National Fleet and Rental Companies, OEMs, Large Automotive Groups as well as single location small businesses.


Desired Candidate Profile:

We are currently hiring a highly skilled and motivated Generative AI Engineer to join our talented engineering team. As a Generative AI Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and implementing generative AI solutions to solve complex problems and drive innovation across our organization.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop AI/ML solutions from inception to deployment using Python and state of the art LLM/GenAI frameworks.
  • Prototype and build proof of concepts (POCs) to demonstrate the feasibility and value of solutions.
  • Research and develop innovative applications of LLMs to address complex real world challenges.
  • Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define AI project requirements and objectives, ensuring alignment with overall business goals.
  • Developing clear and concise documentation, including technical specifications, user guides, and presentations, to communicate complex AI concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.


Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s Degree or current enrollment in a final course, majoring in Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, or a related field.
  • 1+ year of hands-on experience with Python.
  • Strong background in NLP and at least 1 year of hands-on experience working with Large Language Models (LLMs), such as GPT-4o, Claude, or Gemini. Experience with LLM platforms and frameworks like OpenAI API, Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, and PyTorch.
  • Proven ability to develop scalable API solutions and perform prompt engineering.
  • Excellent communication skills in English, capable of explaining complex LLM capabilities and limitations to non-technical stakeholders.

title: Consultor SAP SRM Pleno
description:
Sobre nós

A Atos é uma líder global em transformação digital, com cerca de 94.000 colaboradores e uma receita anual de aproximadamente €11 bilhões de euros. Número um na Europa em cibersegurança, nuvem e computação de alto desempenho, o Grupo oferece soluções personalizadas de ponta a ponta para todos os setores em 69 países. Pioneira em serviços e produtos de descarbonização, a Atos está comprometida com um ambiente digital seguro e descarbonizado para seus clientes. A Atos é uma SE (Societas Europaea) e está listada na Euronext Paris.



Buscamos um Consultor SAP SRM Pleno para atuação em cliente Atos.

Horário comercial

Perfil Pleno

Atuação Remota


O que você vai fazer:

Descrição:

  • Profissional irá atuar com SRM com vivência em MM



O que buscamos? - Requisitos

  • Nível Superior
  • Conhecimento de processo (gestão de contratos, cotação, pedido de compra) e configuração
  • Atuação em atendimento de chamados e melhorias
  • Dimensionamento de esforço para desenvolvimento de melhorias
  • Conhecimento funcional de WEBDYNPRO
  • Conhecimento de aprovação de WORKFLOW
  • Conhecimento de ABAP para DEBUG
  • Conhecimento em RM (diferencial)




Benefícios:

✓ Vale refeição ou Vale alimentação

✓ Plano de saúde extensível a cônjuge e filhos

✓ Plano odontológico

✓ Programa de remuneração variável

✓ Auxílio creche - conforme regras sindicais da localidade

✓ Wellhub (Gympass)

✓ Convênio com farmácias – descontos em medicamentos

✓ Previdência Privada com seguro de vida adicional

✓ Seguro de vida

✓ Empréstimo Consignado (após 1 ano de empresa)

✓ Convênio com empresas parceiras (Descontos para realização de graduação, pós-graduação, MBA e Idiomas)

✓ Política de Subsídios para Pós-graduação, MBAs e Certificações (A Atos apoia o seu desenvolvimento, subsidiando financeiramente ações externas)

✓ Speexx (curso online de até 5 idiomas gratuitamente)

✓ Programa de treinamentos internos e externos

✓ Universidade corporativa (E-learning com milhares de cursos disponíveis gratuitamente)

✓ Terapia online

✓ Programa de acompanhamento à gestante (acompanhamento médico online durante a gestação para colaboradoras ou cônjuges)

✓ Programa Minha Nova Parceria de Confiança (para colaboradores e cônjuges. Válido também para filhos adotivos) - Brinde especial + Cartão presente com valor em dinheiro

✓ Day off no seu aniversário

✓ Parceria com a Samsung (descontos na compra de diversos produtos)

✓ Bônus de indicação para nossas vagas (conforme política interna)

✓ Jubileu (premiação personalizada por tempo de empresa)

✓ Accolade (Programa de reconhecimento)



Aviso de Diversidade

Entendemos a diversidade como um fator valioso. Todas as nossas oportunidades são Afirmativas para Pessoas com Deficiência.

Valorizamos a diversidade independentemente de identidade ou expressão de gênero, orientação sexual, religião, etnia, idade, deficiência, nacionalidade ou qualquer outro aspecto.


Aviso de Proteção de Dados

Os dados pessoais coletados serão utilizados exclusivamente para o processo seletivo e tratados conforme os níveis de segurança adotados pela Atos.

Caso haja alguma dúvida relacionada à proteção de dados ou qualquer aspecto envolvendo o tratamento realizado, você pode entrar em contato por meio do canal:

title: Senior Data Scientist
description:
Company Description

Predict.law allows personal injury attorneys and their firms to predict case outcomes with AI, simulate changes to cases, and share professional case reports with colleagues and clients.


Role Description

This is a full-time remote role for a Senior Data Scientist at Predict.law. The Senior Data Scientist will be responsible for predictive modeling, recommendation modeling, feature generation, hyper parameter tuning, exploratory data analysis, model versioning, optimizing for performance, and explaining data findings on a day-to-day basis.


Qualifications

  • Professional English
  • 3+ years working for a US startup or company
  • 5+ years experience overall
  • Data Science skills - Predictive Models, Optimization Models, Model Versioning, Feature Generation, Hyper parameter tuning
  • Familiar with Azure data and cloud stack
  • Statistics skills
  • Data Analytics skills
  • Data Analysis skills
  • Strong problem-solving and critical thinking abilities
  • Experience with machine learning and AI technologies
  • Advanced degree in a related field such as Data Science, Statistics, or Mathematics

title: Desenvolvedor Java Full Stack
description:
Engesoftware está em busca de um Desenvolvedor de Java Full Stack SR para compor o seu time!

Vaga extensível para Pessoas com Deficiência - PCD


Benefícios:

  • Apoio jurídico, caso precise;
  • Apoio nutricional, para uma alimentação mais saudável;
  • Apoio financeiro, para planejar finanças pessoais ou investimento a longo prazo;
  • Apoio social, orientação para momentos pessoais difíceis;
  • Apoio psicológico, para aquecer a mente e o coração;
  • Descontos exclusivos com instituições como Descontos exclusivos com instituições como (SESI, SESC, Anhanguera, Estácio, IESB, Unifametro e Rockfeller);
  • Crédito consignado (Vipe);
  • Plano Enge Pets, seu amiguinho peludo terá o melhor cuidado;
  • Parceria com o Bali Park, O Bal é um espaço de lazer e entretenimento;
  • VA/VR;
  • Plano de saúde;
  • Plano odontológico (Bradesco);
  • Seguro de vida (Santander zuric);
  • Salário a combinar;
  • Vaga na modalidade Home Office;


Requisitos Necessários:

  • Ensino superior concluído em TI ou áreas correlatas;
  • Possuir uma das seguintes certificação: SCBCD – Sun Certified Business Component Developer; SCWCD – Sun Certified Web Component Developer; SCDJWS – Sun Certified Developer for Java Web Services;
  • Possuir a seguinte certificação TOGAF (The Open Group Architecture Framework);
  • Programação em Java;


Requisitos Desejáveis:

  • Experiência mínima de 5 anos na área;


Estamos em busca de um profissional que queira somar com o nosso time e crescer com a gente!!

Venha ser um Power Enge!!!

title: Arquiteto Blockchain
description:
A Foursys é um time apaixonado por inovação, design e transformação digital.

Somos globais, somos GPTW.

‍ ♿️ Na Foursys, celebramos a diversidade e acreditamos que são as diferentes ideias e perspectivas que nos enriquecem. Portanto, sua cor, religião, gênero, raça, nacionalidade, idade, origem, identidade de gênero, deficiência ou orientação sexual não são barreiras para se juntar à nossa equipe. #VemSerFoursys!

Que tal se juntar a nós e se tornar um(a) #FourTalent? Então se liga nessa oportunidade incrível:


Responsabilidade


  • Liderar a arquitetura e design de soluções blockchain inovadoras e alinhadas aos objetivos estratégicos.
  • Analisar requisitos técnicos e de negócio para definir a arquitetura blockchain mais adequada.
  • Escolher plataformas, protocolos, mecanismos de consenso e modelos de dados.
  • Desenvolver e manter documentação técnica detalhada.
  • Avaliar e testar novas tecnologias por meio de PoCs e pilotos.
  • Garantir segurança, escalabilidade, performance e interoperabilidade das soluções.
  • Definir padrões e boas práticas em projetos blockchain.
  • Contribuir para o roadmap tecnológico e estratégias de inovação.



Conhecimento Técnico


  • Conhecimento sólido em diferentes arquiteturas blockchain (públicas, privadas, permissionadas, consórcio).
  • Experiência com plataformas como Ethereum, Hyperledger Fabric, Corda, Binance Smart Chain, entre outras.
  • Domínio no desenvolvimento de smart contracts (ex: Solidity, Go).
  • Forte compreensão em criptografia, segurança, gestão de chaves e mecanismos de consenso (PoW, PoS, PoA).



E temos também o Clube da Four que oferece ótimas vantagens!

  • Contribuir para o roadmap tecnológico e estratégias de inovação.



Conhecimento Técnico


  • Conhecimento sólido em diferentes arquiteturas blockchain (públicas, privadas, permissionadas, consórcio).
  • Experiência com plataformas como Ethereum, Hyperledger Fabric, Corda, Binance Smart Chain, entre outras.
  • Domínio no desenvolvimento de smart contracts (ex: Solidity, Go).
  • Forte compreensão em criptografia, segurança, gestão de chaves e mecanismos de consenso (PoW, PoS, PoA).



E temos também o Clube da Four que oferece ótimas vantagens!

title: Arquiteto Blockchain

Somos globais, somos GPTW.

title: Senior Mobile Engineer - Android
description:
We are seeking to bring on board a Senior Mobile Engineer with a deep understanding of native Android development and cross-platform development using Kotlin Multiplatform. This role requires a strong grasp of software development methodologies and the ability to design, develop and maintain complex mobile applications leveraging Kotlin Multiplatform to target both iOS and Android platforms, while also contributing significantly to the technical excellence of the team.


Responsibilities


  • Exceptional problem solving skills to identify and solve complex technical issues efficiently.
  • Collaborates with cross-functional teams to integrate mobile and backend components seamlessly.
  • Communicates effectively with team members, stakeholders and non-technical persons and also collaborates well within a team, sharing knowledge and mentoring junior developers.
  • Shows a strong commitment to learning and staying up to date with emerging technologies and industry trends.


Technology Requirements


  • Minimum of 1 year of practical experience with Kotlin Multiplatform for building cross-platform mobile applications.
  • Minimum of 3 years of professional experience as a mobile engineer specializing in Android application development with Kotlin.
  • Minimum of 2 years of experience developing user interfaces with Jetpack Compose.
  • Solid understanding and practical application of architectural patterns such as MVC, MVVM, and Clean Architecture.
  • Proven experience integrating Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) devices with mobile applications.
  • Experience developing and deploying applications that utilize smart watch information.
  • Demonstrated experience navigating the submission and issue resolution processes for the Google Play Store.
  • Familiarity with CI/CD for mobile applications. Experience utilizing tools like Git, Fastlane, and Jenkins.
  • Experience writing comprehensive unit, integration, and UI tests for Android applications.


Profile Requirements


  • Ability to learn quickly and work independently.
  • Strong project management and interpersonal skills.
  • A team player who enjoys collaborating with others.
  • A passion for fitness is a plus.

title: Scrum Master
description:
Project Description:

Our Client is one of the largest TV providers in North America and we are searching for an experienced Scrum Manager to join our team. The project focuses on developing mobile application for a video streaming platform.


Responsibilities:

- Preparing and facilitating daily Scrum meetings, Sprint Planning, Review/Demo, Retrospectives, Product Backlog Refinement, and other Team meetings;

- Coordinate and communicate development progress, and blockers across all stakeholders;

- Coaching of Delivery Teams in Scrum framework;

- Project Management activities;

- Management of Relationships with stakeholders;

- Calculation of metrics (velocity, capacity, quality).


Mandatory Skills Description:

- Strong technical project management skills

- Excellent written/verbal communication skills

- Strong problem-solving skills to diagnose and resolve delivery issues/blockers


Nice-to-Have Skills Description:

Agile Project Management


Languages:

English: C1 Advanced

title: Administrative Analyst
description:
We are looking for an Operations Admin to support our Central Operations team and US Operations markets in general administrative tasks and onboarding growth. If you are a well organized, analytical person with exceptional communication and problem solving skills then this role may be for you!



What You’ll Focus On:

  • Support our US Operations Cities on growth deliverables and efficiencies in our day to day work and operations
  • Automations for our ways of working when it comes to growth and portfolio changes
  • Analyze data in order to create and prepare detailed reports for the leadership team that effectively communicate trends, patterns, and predictions using relevant data
  • Standardize our ways of working across markets to improve timeliness and execution on furnishings and move-outs
  • Perform audits and improve data metrics for our guests and internal teams, as well as manage timely data collection to update productivity and achievements on projects
  • Unit/Building/Process information entry, ensuring all fields are accurately filled and clear for other teams
  • Collaborate with operational team members and organizational leaders to identify gaps and opportunities for process improvements
  • Communicate with third party vendors and companies if needed to support OPS/CX operations
  • Specific admin support related to onboarding and move-out of units for our US cities including:
  • Complete utility and telecommunication setups for new units with third party companies (create online portals, set up payments, and input data into our internal system)
  • Complete Package Setups for new units (create online portals, set up payments, and input data into our internal system)
  • Cancel utility and telecommunication accounts for move-outs
  • Support the scheduling of furnishing and onboarding tasks and move-outs:
  • Communicate with third party vendors and buildings to schedule pick ups
  • Input data into our system related to our properties
  • Track disposal and data related to move-outs
  • Support Central Operations, OPS local team, and finance/accounting with ad-hoc projects



What we are looking for:

  • Degree from a top-tier university
  • Min. 1-2 years of experience in a similar role (administrative experience in residential or hospitality experience will be considered as a plus)
  • Fluency in English
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Word, Excel (formulation, data entry, charts, pivot tables) and Powerpoint
  • Self-starter with a roll up your sleeves mentality and high attention to detail
  • Entrepreneurial drive, adaptability, and focus on results
  • Strong quantitative and analytical skills
  • Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple assignments
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • Ability to work independently and with speed
